1.caption_en:
A circular "Platform Value Network" infographic with a central ring labeled "CORE VALUE" and "MISSION," divided into four quadrants for Consumers, Producers, Partners, and Owners, and horizontal sections marked "VALUE PROPOSITIONS" and "TRANSACTIONS."
